story.title: Bedtime at the Edge of the Galaxy

chapters.title: The Journey Begins
chapters.content: An excited young child turned excitedly to their parents as they waited in line for the last few supplies and passengers on a large planned space station. They, their parents, and the rest of the passengers were about to proceed on a journey to a new planet and new frontier.
chapters.illustration: The child holding their parents' hands and looking ahead with a childish sense of wonder.

chapters.title: A Home Away from Home
chapters.content: The friendly crew of AI welcomed the passengers aboard the large ship and showed them to their cabins. The family, and all the others, settled into their new home away from home as the ship continued its slow acceleration toward their destination.
chapters.illustration: The animated AI crew hustling to get the passengers settled in their cabins.

chapters.title: Dreaming of the StarryStars
chapters.content: Sufficiently settled, the child and their parents lay down for bed. The child looked out of the window of the cabin, peering into the starry Night sky, fantasizing about all the places and experiences that had been ahead of them. Eventually, the child settled into a reasonably deep slumber.
chapters.illustration: The child smiling peacefully as they observe the stars through the bay window in their cabin.

chapters.title: The Remarkable View
chapters.content: When the child awoke, they were greeted with the genuinely remarkable sight of their new home, the world they traveled so far to find. The ship was now docked at the new settlers facility and they were ushered into the new world where they would call home.
chapters.illustration: The passengers gazing at the wonderful planet from the windows of the docking building.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
"""

messages.name: Assy
